remarks: The group multiple function matches the scalar multiplication function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
statement:
clmmulg.1 $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
clmmulg.2 $e |- .xb = ( .g ` W ) $.
clmmulg.3 $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
clmmulg $p |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ A e. ZZ /\ B e. V ) -> ( A .xb B ) = ( A .x. B ) ) $.
